item.title: Alcide kAudit with EKS
item.description: Alcide kAudit is designed to automatically analyze Kubernetes audit logs to detect anomalous behavior of users and service accounts. kAudit automatically detects security-related issues related to Kubernetes’ administrative actions, especially anomalous behavior that can only be detected from observing extended context over multiple activities. In addition, kAudit supports Audit rules to detect violations of organization compliance policies regarding Kubernetes usage. Incident forensics, along with audit statistics, are presented in graphical and tabular summaries for easy investigation and analysis.
